Monday, Mesori 26th, folio 2. 1/2+1/3+1/48
In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Meṭok(os) and Mark(os) have paid on account of that which was due from them for the land-tax
of S........., the domain of Abû Muḥammad - may God exalt him - one half
and one third and a sixth of an eighth full weight Treasury money
to Yûsuf b. Yaʿqûb, the representative of Abûʾl-Ḥasan
- may God exalt him - and ʿU[m]ar, the representative if Ṣâliḥ and Nafîs, for the impost
of the year 241.
Nafîs trusts in God.
